title: Report: MLB, PA agree to adjustments - TSN
description: Report: MLB, PA agree to adjustments TSN Finalized MLB-MLBPA deal underlines challenges ahead of 2020 season Sportsnet.ca As ‘opening day’ passes quietly, the post-pandemic MLB landscape slowly takes shape Toronto Star MLB players fine with late end to season…
content: NEW YORK Players agreed to a deal with Major League Baseball that would preserve service time in the event this season is cancelled because of the coronavirus pandemic but left open details of what a configured schedule would look like As part of the agree chars
